tool_description: Evaluates potential legal and business risks associated with contract terms and provisions, providing risk ratings and mitigation strategies.

contract_content.description: Complete contract text to assess for risks

party_perspective.description: Which party's perspective to assess risk from

risk_categories.description: Specific risk categories to focus on

error_messages: Invalid contract content: Provide complete contract text for accurate risk assessment.
Invalid party perspective: Specify which contracting party's viewpoint to assess from.
Unknown risk categories: One or more specified risk categories are not recognized.
Assessment failed: Unable to complete risk analysis due to content complexity or format issues.
usage: Provide contract_content and party_perspective. Optionally specify risk_categories and business_context for focused analysis. Returns comprehensive risk evaluation.

risk_level.description: Risk classification: low, medium, high, critical

identified_risks.description: Specific risks identified in the contract

risk_scores.description: Individual risk scores for each identified risk

mitigation_strategies.description: Recommended strategies to mitigate identified risks
